text: Preheat the broiler or grill.  Cut the eggplant into thick slices, lengthwise. Score each slice with the end of a sharp knife. Sprinkle with salt. Set the slices out on paper towels. This will drain out the liquid. Leave for half an hour. Arrange the slices on a baking sheet that has been covered in parchment paper after half an hour. Broil or grill for 15 to 20 minutes. Turn once. Broil until tender. Remove from the broiler. Leave to cool completely. Chop very finely once cooled or place in a food processor with the onion, garlic, and tomato.  Mix the chopped ingredients together in a bowl. Add a small amount of olive oil. Whisk in the lemon juice, salt, and marjoram. Test for taste and adjust as needed. Serve. Keep in the refrigerator until serving time. Serve with crackers.
